channel.title: United Gamerz
channel.description: [b]United-Gamerz Minecraft Economy/ Survival Server![/b] [u]Friendly Staff and 99.9% Uptime![/u] Hello everyone, looking for a fun server to play on? Well United Gamerz is good for anyone who has this desire! With a high percent uptime, game as much as you want! Any time you want! Need help while playing? Ask for a mod and they will be ecstatic to help you out with any problem! Our main Minecraft Server IP: mc.united-gamerz.net Join Us on TeamSpeak 3: ts.united-gamerz.net United Gamerz {UG} Website and forums: united-gamerz.net A peek of our server! [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/66esft.jpg[/img] Enjoy your stay at the United Gamerz! Happy Gaming!

item.title: United Gamerz

item.description:
@Emerald wrote:

United-Gamerz Minecraft Economy/ Survival Server!
Friendly Staff and 99.9% Uptime!
Hello everyone, looking for a fun server to play on? Well United Gamerz is good for anyone who has this desire! With a high percent uptime, game as much as you want! Any time you want!
Need help while playing? Ask for a mod and they will be ecstatic to help you out with any problem!
Our main Minecraft Server IP: mc.united-gamerz.net
Join Us on TeamSpeak 3: ts.united-gamerz.net
United Gamerz {UG} Website and forums: united-gamerz.net
A peek of our server!

Enjoy your stay at the United Gamerz! Happy Gaming!
